name: Save the Chicken (post GameJam WebGL)
description:
Save The Chicken

Game

Save The Chicken is a platformer Game, where your goal is to save some chickens and collect all 8 coins with the usage of your power "True Sight", which allows you to see the difference between the fake and real word. Don't forget that you can use this power for only 25 seconds!

My Work 

It's my first game which was uploaded so i will be thankful if you rate it and write maybe a comment about how do you liked it.

I spend 20+ hours on this project. For anyone who is interested in.

Credits

The whole Development was done by my own and i dint used any Assets. Only my friend helped me out on the background-music, cave-music. The coin sound and the footstep sound were the only sounds which were not made by me ot my friend.

Note: This is a postjam version of my Game!
Orignal Version: https://pokemaxi.itch.io/save-the-chicken

Updates:

V1.01 

  • Bugfix: Only one Chicken was counted on the end of the game               
  • Adjustment: New Controlls

V1.02
